Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Finalize the interactive prototypes for usability testing.
Conduct usability testing with internal team members (@qtest-1, @cdev-1, @cdev-2, @cdev-3). Observe interactions and take notes.
Take a short break, review initial feedback from usability testing.
Compile feedback from usability testing into a report, highlighting key pain points and successes.
Meet with @prod-1 and @ldes-1 to present usability testing findings and discuss next steps.
Begin iterating on the prototypes based on usability testing feedback, starting with the most critical issues.
Save progress and document changes made during the iteration process.
